orchestrator.description: Main coordinator that reads memory, gathers context, creates plans, manages approval, delegates tasks

project-analyzer.description: Analyzes project structure and stack. Use for initial project scanning.

code-archaeologist.description: Context gatherer. Scans project, flags files >300 lines, monoliths, spaghetti code, finds documentation. READ-ONLY analyzer.

documentarist.description: Memory keeper. Updates .ai/memory/ with project context, architectural decisions, task history. ONLY agent that writes to memory.

backend-developer.description: Backend development specialist. API, database, server logic. NO frontend/UI work.

frontend-developer.description: Frontend development specialist. Generates frontend code in .ai/generated-code/.

general-coder.description: Universal developer for CROSS-STACK tasks ONLY. Use when task spans backend + frontend + infra. For specialized work, use domain experts.

ui-ux-designer.description: UI/UX design and frontend patterns. Uses shadcn MCP.

judge-specialist.description: LLM Judge systems for automated quality assurance

langgraph-specialist.description: LangGraph StateGraph workflows and state machine orchestration

llm-service-specialist.description: LLM service layer, token estimation, OpenAI SDK integration

stage-pipeline-specialist.description: Course generation stage phases and pipeline integration

utility-builder.description: Utility services: JSON repair, validation, XSS protection, vector search

database-optimizer.description: Database design, query optimization, and performance tuning

mobile-developer.description: React Native and Flutter mobile development

documentation-specialist.description: Technical writing for user guides, tutorials, API docs

context-manager.description: Context management across agents and long-running tasks

learning-extractor.description: Extracts reusable patterns from sessions and creates skills. Use after complex tasks or on /retrospective command.

analyze.template: Analyze the codebase and create a plan for: $ARGUMENTS

retrospective.description: Extract learned patterns from session into reusable skills
retrospective.template: Analyze the session and extract reusable patterns into skills. Focus on: $ARGUMENTS

verify.description: Run comprehensive verification on current codebase
verify.template: Run verification loop. Mode: $ARGUMENTS (quick|full|pre-commit|pre-pr). Load skill(verification-loop) and execute all phases.

checkpoint.description: Create or verify a checkpoint in workflow
